meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeremy Cohen Valerie O'Brien David Bell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3999.

td.p: Jeremy Cohen, a television producer from Washington, D.C.
Valerie O'Brien, a Spanish instructor from Arlington, Virginia
David Bell, an advertising executive from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $44,199)

tr.td: ALICE IN WONDERLAND
SAILOR TALK
HISTORICAL COLLECT CALL FROM...
FOREIGN FUNDS
MUSIC MEN
VERB FIRST NAMES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The story began as a tale told to Alice Liddell & her sisters during a rowing trip on this river')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The story began as a tale told to Alice Liddell & her sisters during a rowing trip on this river

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Valerie: What is lover?)

lubber

Valerie
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_2', 'clue_J_4_2_stuck', '(Alex: Currency is the [*].
Valerie, good news
and bad news for you.
You\'re the only one with cash at the moment.
However, our judges
have reviewed your response a few minutes ago. I thought I heard you say "lover." They\'ve checked the tape, and you did say "lover" instead of "lubber," so the $400 you have gets taken away. But you\'re tied for the lead.)

peso

Triple Stumper
')
